info.name: Custom Google Background v1.1
info.description: Customize Google the way you want. Change the background as you wish!
info.additionalInfo:
Right click style and choose edit. At the top of the style sheet, you can change the image url to whatever you please!

v1.1 (12-12-14)
- fixed rounded edges to be square again

data.title: Did what it said it would do
